website_summaries.verdict: Nice price point for a full-size roll of industrial stretch wrap at 15 inches of width and almost 1,500 feet of length.
pros: Available in multipacks, so you can order as much film as you need
Uses folded edges in the design of the roll to provide enhanced tear-resistance
Pre-stretched, so it is easier to apply
Better price per square foot than many similar stretch wrap products
cons: Not quite as thick as some other wrap products that cost a bit more

customer_reviews.title: Practical Extra Durable Saran Wrap
customer_reviews.text: This is like a giant roll of extra durable Saran Wrap. What do I use it for? Everything. If I mail an article of clothing, I wrap it in this before putting in the package or box. I wrap furniture and paintings and anything that is stored in my basement. I find it very handy and easy to use. If you don’t have large zip locks storage bags, use this to wrap your sheets and blankets for storage. Pulling it right will compress them for extra space. I wonder if it would work on my Gutt? Just kidding.
customer_reviews.author: Delilah

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my colleagues
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my colleagues, I purchased the wrap for storing away some furniture. The wrap is sticky enough to hold the furniture and other smaller pieces in a firm bundle. It is easy to tear away at the end of the wrapping. A industrial grade storage supply comes with a consumer friendly price tag. Very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: werly

customer_reviews.title: Very good for packing. Price is very fair.
customer_reviews.text: Thy were pretty sturdy in my opinion. Did the job that I needed for paking my furnitures when I had to move recently. Great experience.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Along with blankets this protected all my furniture.
customer_reviews.text: One roll was plenty to move our 4 bedroom house. I covered all the dressers and tables with blankets and then this plastic. We have those plastic storage drawers too that I filled with light weight things and wrapped it close with the plastic and tape.
customer_reviews.author: Poyster

customer_reviews.title: There was plenty of wrap to take care of my ...
customer_reviews.text: There was plenty of wrap to take care of my move. It seemed strong and did not tear while the movers wrapped the furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Val Lynn

customer_reviews.title: This wrap is great. We used it For moving and wrap all ...
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is great. We used it For moving and wrap all of our furnitures. Compared to the last ones we had, this is by far much more durable. And it doesn’t rip at the corners of our tables and couches.
customer_reviews.author: HeLen

customer_reviews.title: Really good in strength!!!
customer_reviews.text: Its an incredible wrapping roll. I used it to wrap my luggage and it came very well. Its good in strength and sufficient. I wrapped 3 checkin luggage and still left a lot. Its usefull to protect luggage. Super recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality! Very pleased with this stretch wrap
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! Very pleased with this stretch wrap. Made my shipping duties much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Thin - not very sticky
customer_reviews.text: I'm a teacher and I bought this to make packing my classroom items easier. It works okay, but it is very thin and not very sticky. I had to wrap twice as many times as some of my friends who spent more money on their wrap. Mine still worked, but they saved in the long run because they bought wrap that was thicker and stuck to itself better.
customer_reviews.author: Shootnstr8

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast way to disinfect massage table
customer_reviews.text: Makes my job easier faster and safer. I use it to cover my massage table so no cross contamination. Keeps your table disinfected throughout the procedure just remove it for next client wipe down replace for next client so easy, the wide tubing makes it so easy and fast to dress your table
customer_reviews.author: Nails/microBladByJanetWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick back to itself very well.
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be shrink wrap for packing. There is nothing sticky about it. Once you unroll it and try to wrap it around a stack of boxes or the like, it barely sticks back in to itself. I ended up using a huge roll of super sticky cling film I bought at Costco that was intended for kitchen them use.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Does exactly what I needed at a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Does exactly what I needed at a great price. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Hill

customer_reviews.title: The Rolls are less than what im used to. ...
customer_reviews.text: The Rolls are less than what im used to. The wrap doesnt cling as well as others either. The price on these cheaper rolls are getting more and more expensive and reaching the rate at which they're just not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: xexy

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price
customer_reviews.text: We ship weekly for our online furniture business and will only use this wrap . I once had to order another brand that shipped Prime when I got in a time crunch and I regretted it! This wrap is perfect for what we do - wrapping small and large pieces of furniture - and we always get comments from our clients about the professional packaging job. Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Only 30 Gauge.
customer_reviews.text: Returned immediately. This is only 30 gauge wrap.... Saran Wrap is a better option. I've worked in warehouses. Anything less than 80 gauge is just too light. Not acceptable for pallet wrap in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Sundance

customer_reviews.title: STRONG!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Well made and will definitely purchase from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money stretch wrap is not even have the size that is advertised
customer_reviews.text: It seems like the stretch wrap rolls continue to get smaller and smaller I would not be purchasing any more from these guys I wrap one piece of furniture and almost depleted and entire roll.
customer_reviews.author: Eskimo

customer_reviews.title: Would not purchase again from this sellar.
customer_reviews.text: This is no where near the quality product you expect like the kind you purchase at your local hardware store or Storage rental place. It’s worth the money to purchase local and get quality. You will use more of this poor quality wrap than you need too just because it’s so weak.
customer_reviews.author: FLG

customer_reviews.title: A++++++ nice item, price and quality
customer_reviews.text: Product was excellent quality super fast shipping, totally recommend this product and seller
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Great and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great product I use it all the time for my moving service
customer_reviews.author: edgar

customer_reviews.title: Keep searching
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't wait to be done with it. Doesn't stick well at all. Barely stretches. Bought better product @ better prices off Amazon unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not your regular stretch wrap.
customer_reviews.text: I guess it was in the description when it said "pre stretched", but I was not expecting to get a loosely wrapped roll. There is no where near as much wrap as a traditional roll of stretch wrap. This might be ok for home use. Not very good for industrial.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: awesome wrapper!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing wrapper I have gotten, super durable, package was professional, shipping speed was quick, if you are ever in the market for some wrapping films, definitely buy it from MuzGlobal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and then she recommended it to me
customer_reviews.text: This product was bought because of my friend's recommendation. She used it for packing when she moved due to her job change, and then she recommended it to me. I like its ability to stretch and fit well to protect the furniture. Great job!
customer_reviews.author: Yi-Shin Ho

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stick to itself!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not stick to itself!!! I had to fight w/ it to tape it down so it’d stay & not fall off!! It made a 1 person job a 2 person job & I would’ve loved to have had a 3rd person to be in charge of just the taping!!
customer_reviews.author: Melody Creech

customer_reviews.title: Overall great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit shorter than my other brand but still does the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Max V

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrap!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed when I moved. This wrap is really nice and is exactly what I used when I worked in a warehouse to wrap up palates.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: ... many kind of film and this one is very good. I am not using for very heavy items ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used many kind of film and this one is very good. I am not using for very heavy items so it is good by far. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cool man

customer_reviews.title: Strong Great Product
customer_reviews.text: First time using a wrap film but this instantly solved my shipment falling apart issue. My customers are satisfied with a well wrapped shipment. Now I can safely ship my products worry free. Very recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great for move
customer_reviews.text: I was able to wrap my daughter's bedroom furniture for an out of town move. Had more than enough left over
customer_reviews.author: Ceci

customer_reviews.title: What a rip off, not even what is printed on the boxes.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 6 cases of what was to be 24 rolls of shrink wrap. Each box was not even the actual product packed inside. By no means was there 1,484' of plastic on the roll. There might not be 2,000' on all four rolls in the box.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Berry

customer_reviews.title: El Cheapo Quality
customer_reviews.text: The plastic feels like it came from a roll that had been unraveled and rewound because the plastic is very loose. Maybe it's just poor quality plastic. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JTeezy

customer_reviews.title: VERY thin
customer_reviews.text: It works, bit its super thin and so you have to use 2 to 3 times the amount that you would have if you bought the green kinda from the home store.
customer_reviews.author: MN Mama

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, does not do the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst wrap I have used. It is neither stretchy nor sticky. The flimsy plastic does not stick to itself and lacks the strength. I used it to wrap mattress for several rounds and the wrap still failed to do the job. I was disappointed with its quality but could not return it as it is over 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Y.

customer_reviews.title: Extremely thin and hard to wrap
customer_reviews.text: Extremely thin and low quality.Pay few extra bucks and get a good one.Which can provide real protection.Quality is of food saver wrap.
customer_reviews.author: Imad

customer_reviews.title: Super thin
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for cross country move. Good thing the box contained 4 rolls, we used every inch. Food stretch wrap from Costco was more useful to keep this in place.
customer_reviews.author: Nelle

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is really good stretch film. It is not easy to break. I would recommend to everyone who watch in warehouse. It is definitely suitable for heavy duty
customer_reviews.author: H Ran

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product it is light and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: It’s cheap, it works, and when I need more I’ll be ordering this stuff. Compared to big box this is a killer deal.
customer_reviews.author: Rigo_suave

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This wrap is so firm that it can be stretched extensively without breaking and is extra sticky so that it can stay on the surface of objects for a long period of time. The difference in quality between this wrap and other wraps could easily be felt when I touched it. I used this wrap for my most recent move. Not only did my furnitures remained undamaged, my furnitures hardly moved in my vehicle. This wrap made my most recent move way easier than previous ones. Given the quality of the move that I experienced, the cost for the wrap is relatively low. I'm just glad that I have finally found the perfect wrap for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not tightly wrapped
customer_reviews.text: not tightly wrapped. i dont know about it being 1476.
customer_reviews.author: MasterGen

customer_reviews.title: Durable packing plastic
customer_reviews.text: This is not adhesive at all but it works great if u pull it tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon1

customer_reviews.title: There had been comments saying that it breaks easily, but I think because it’s so thin I ...
customer_reviews.text: After trying this wrap, I realized it’s lighter and easier to use than other ones I had tried in the past, mainly because it’s 30 gauge, making it thinner than normal wraps. There had been comments saying that it breaks easily, but I think because it’s so thin I can use two layers to wrap and they won’t break. I highly recommend this wrap. Those who give it a try will know what I mean.
customer_reviews.author: Wurb

customer_reviews.title: Ok wrap
customer_reviews.text: Got the best rap that I've ever bought and it's certainly not the worst it's right there in the middle
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stick
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't purchase this product again. It doesn't stick to itself well at all, plus it attracts lint and hair.
customer_reviews.author: thebookreaders

customer_reviews.title: poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Plastic is very thin. you have to wrap at least 6 times to make sure your furniture is clean while moving

customer_reviews.title: Should not be on same day list
customer_reviews.text: These were on same day list and I was on a tight schedule. Took 2 days to arrive and missed my schedule so returning.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Banks

customer_reviews.title: Good as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is good value and easy to use. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Yufeng Lin

customer_reviews.title: Bad...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible wrap. We purchased two different ones and this one really sucked lol: Does not hold Feels cheaper
customer_reviews.author: Ehuanochtli

customer_reviews.title: lots of wrap
customer_reviews.text: wrapped a 68 cobra car in it (lots of wrapping) and towed across country. Did very well with clinging together and protecting car from debris, dust, water.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: tears easy and wont stick to itself looks like someone rewrapped the roll cant wrap anything without it tearing

customer_reviews.title: Shorted on order
customer_reviews.text: Only received 1 roll instead of 2. Started to use the roll. Do not know how to get credit?
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Easy use.
customer_reviews.text: Finally finish my move with this useful film. This is my first time buy this kind of stuff, my boy friend give me the link to buy it. Make my move easy.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy kuo

customer_reviews.title: Not very good
customer_reviews.text: First time using this "pre-stretched". Didn't care for it, because it doesn't stick very well.

customer_reviews.title: AAA+++++++
customer_reviews.text: Really good quality item for my moving item, help our process a lot and easy, will buy again.

customer_reviews.title: 30 gauge
customer_reviews.text: If you were curious this is only 30 gauge wrap, very light weight and not very stong.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, delivery on time. Excellent customer services. Like it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Annabella

customer_reviews.title: False advertising.. Only 997 feet per roll
customer_reviews.text: Product description is that it’s 1447 feet per roll. There’s only 997 feet per roll. Blatant false advertising.. Rolls go very quick. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Doug S

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky and Not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: Not sticky and Not strong enough to tight a few boxes together
customer_reviews.author: Someone

customer_reviews.title: Better quality elsewhere for just a couple bucks more
customer_reviews.text: If you're not picky or have basic household items to wrap, this should be just fine, But if you're used to the good stuff or have high-end furniture to ship or boxes to protect, stay away. This is uber thin, can't stretch without tearing, and doesn't stick to itself. Typically, much like food storage plastic wrap, you would want a higher quality wrap to not come undone once applied. For just a few bucks more, I founds this one which is much higher in strength, durability, and overall quality:
customer_reviews.author: Flip

customer_reviews.title: Got box, which weighed about half of what the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got box, which weighed about half of what the boxes I buy usually weigh. Opened and the rolls could not possibly have been 18 gauge at 1500 feet. They were loosely rolled and if heft is any guide had about a third of the mass of the stretch wrap I regularly purchase. No problems at all on the return for refund, so I'll give them that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only OK for the price
customer_reviews.text: For those of us who use shrinkwrap on a daily basis to blanket wrap furniture or secure items for shipping, this is more like saran wrap that you can buy at your local grocery store except larger. It easily breaks when stretched which is the whole idea in the first place, and I will not purchase it again. Next time I will spend a bit more money and get the better quality stretchwrap
customer_reviews.author: Toolman

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it was cumbersome to use.
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t like the quality of the shrink wrap. Wasn’t up to par as in the elasticity of it. Especially using this for bigger items. Ironically , I’m compensated and ended up using different brand of smaller size instead which surprisingly works bettter! ( If needed, see my other review of shrink wrap to find brand I’m referring to). It didn’t had a handle so made it much harder to wrap boxes, objects,furniture on larger scale, definitely not if you’re tackling single handily. Had to return it .But save $ cuz in the end didn’t even needed this. :)
customer_reviews.author: Eilin

customer_reviews.title: Only 30 gauge
customer_reviews.text: Only 30 gauge, bought these for wrapping pallets in our warehouse. Wish there was more detailed information on the product page.
customer_reviews.author: Doffod

customer_reviews.title: Not as sticky as I'd expect. I'm using this ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as sticky as I'd expect. I'm using this for moving, for certain items I don't need to pack in boxes. Takes quite a bit of it to feel secure.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren G

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: found some few holes in it while wrapping up my furniture.. its ok..
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline G.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Thinnest and least amount of plastic I have seen on a roll.

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick to itself and not useful in the purpose of my intention
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I did not see the pre stretched part?? and what does that mean? Does not stick to itself and not useful in the purpose of my intention. (moving)
customer_reviews.author: Bianca

customer_reviews.title: Not the advertised length
customer_reviews.text: The plastic wrap is pretty thin and the roll doesn't have a lot of weight to it. I thought I was going to be getting almost 1500ft of plastic wrap, but the box clearly says the length is 304 meters.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for my move and worked perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nirmal S.

product_meta.title: MuzGlobal Cast Stretch Wrap Film- Pre-Stretched 1476 Length x 15" Width Clear. (Pack of 4)
product_meta.description:
Size:4 Pack
MuzGlobal Pre-stretch film can be easily used for various applications thanks to its pre-stretched quality. 
Features: 

The product is thin yet sturdy. 

Its light weight increases efficiency of use. 

Its firmness is comparable to that of machine wrap, therefore, renders it suitable for jobs ranging from pallet securing to furniture wrapping. 

The material of which it is made allows it to display strength and tenacity, as it reduces chance for punctures, persistently sticks to targeted objects, and can be extensively stretched without breaking. 

Each roll of MuzGlobal Pre-Stretch Film measure 1476 feet by 15 inches and ships as a pack of 4.
feature_bullets: Pre-stretched film tightens after application offering better film cling
Pre-stretched roll is easier to apply requiring less torque than standard stretch wrap
Designed as a high performance and environmentally sensitive hand film
Folded edges provide added strength and reduced tearing

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
